page.title: 09Employment In Handsacre.
page.content: Mining is the main sorce of employment in Armitage with Handsacre.In Handsacre there are houses built by the Coal Board.50 miners from Handsacre work at Lea Hall Colliery.Armitage Shanks makes bathroom suites. Armitage Shanks is the biggest firm in Armitage with Handsacre.The Manor Park Quarry near Kings Bromley which provides sand and gravel.Many people are unemployed. Our questionnaire showed these results: JOBS MOTHER FATHER SON DAUGHTER Unemployed 12 13 6 6 Miners 0 40 10 0 Cleaners 6 0 0 0 Electricians 0 4 0 0 Housewifes 32 0 0 0 Bakery 0 0 0 2 There are many other jobs that people do but only cover 1 or two persons per job.
